actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in the name of the Select Committee on Ethics in In re American Continental Corporation/Lincoln Savings and Loan Securities Litigation.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in the name of the Select Committee on Ethics in In re American Continental Corporation/Lincoln Savings and Loan Securities Litigation, in support of the interest of the Senate in preserving the confidentiality of preliminary inquiries of such committee.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in the name of the Select Committee on Ethics in In re American Continental Corporation/Lincoln Savings and Loan Securities Litigation.
